name: Improved Unarmed Strike

sections.text: You are considered to be armed even when unarmed—you do not provoke attacks of opportunity when you attack foes while unarmed. Your unarmed strikes can deal lethal or nonlethal damage, at your choice.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: Without this feat, you are considered unarmed when attacking with an unarmed strike, and you can deal only nonlethal damage with such an attack.
sections.name: Normal

description: You are skilled at fighting while unarmed.
